channel.title: theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLbreakingNews, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Federal judge blocks Trump admin from firing 2 Dem members of privacy oversight board
item.description: A federal judge blocked President Donald Trump from firing Democratic members of a federal oversight board, arguing their jobs were protected.

item.title: Amy Sherald at the Whitney: Far More Than Michelle Obama’s Portrait
item.description: She’s a talented artist, but she needs to avoid rich, white, liberal groupthink, since it’ll ruin her work.

item.title: The Lost Post-Presidency of Joe Biden
item.description: In a long line of bad decisions, his last may very well be his worst.

item.title: The Tariff Roller Coaster Is Playing Tricks on You
item.description: Despite recent cuts, the rates Americans are set to pay have increased considerably since Trump took office.

item.title: Watchdog recommends axing 11 government properties including several agencies' headquarters in D.C.

item.title: Congress Must Use Every Tool At Its Disposal To Uncover Biden DementiaGate Cover-Up
